Description:
Detects attempts of decoding a base64 Gzip archive in a PowerShell script. This technique is often used as a method to load malicious content into memory afterward.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious FromBase64String Usage On Gzip Archive - Ps Script
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%frombase64string%' and scriptblocktext like '%memorystream%' and scriptblocktext like '%h4si%')
